Title: Famous people, famous words -- Engels
Publisher: Neimenggu daxue chubanshe (内蒙古大学出版社)
Notes: "Famous people, famous words" is an educational series from 1996, presenting a number of famous persons, both Chinese and foreign, and their famous utterances.This quote from Friedrich Engels (1820-1895) reads: "Whoever is willing to work hard can make many achievements and be outstanding" (谁肯认真地工作，谁就能做出许多成绩，就能超群出众).
